title: 新人报道·
txt_content:

我终于一级了！大家来祝贺祝贺·{:10_492:}
大家给予点金粒吧！[grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget][grid_gold_nugget]
谢谢大家谢谢大家的恩赐！我心领了！
